name: Angel's Feather
description: Holding it gives you a feeling of peace.
action: When you are required to make a trait roll, you may instead bury the Angel's Feather. If you do, choose a number from 0-8. Use that number as the result of the required roll.

name: Brooch
description: Icy to the touch, but somehow comforting.
action: Whenever you take Physical or Mental damage, you may instead take it as General damage.

name: Chainsaw
description: It has a start button - how convenient!
action: When you use the Chainsaw to attack, add one die to your attack

name: Creepy Doll
description: Its eyes are oddly soft... and judgmental.
action: Once during your turn, you may use the Creepy Doll to reroll all dice on a trait roll you just made. Then, lose 1 Sanity.

name: Crossbow
description: Old, but effective.
action: When you use the Crossbow to attack, you may attack any character (explorer or monster) on your tile or an adjacent tile. You and the defender each roll Speed. Roll one extra die on that attack. If you lose, you take no damage.

name: Dynamite
description: It's probably still stable.
action: You may use Dynamite in place of a regular attack. To do so, bury the Dynamite and then choose your tile or an adjacent one. Everyone (explorers and monsters) on the chosen tile must make a Speed roll. 4+: Nothing happens. 0-3: Take 4 physical damage.

name: First Aid Kit
description: Something for everyone.
action: On your turn, you may bury the First Aid Kit. If you do, heal all of your critical traits. You may use the First Aid Kit to heal another explorer on your tile.

name: Flashlight
description: Caution: Do not point at eyes.
action: During Events, you may roll 2 extra dice on trait rolls.

name: Gun
description: Fully loaded.
action: When you use the Gun to attack, you may attack any target in line of sight. .you and the defender each roll Speed. If you lose, you take no damage.

name: Headphones
description: They aren't connected to anything, but they still play a tune. It's soothing.
action: Whenever you take Mental damage, reduce that damage by 1.

name: Leather Jacket
description: It's very heavy. You aren't sure what kind of animal it's from.
action: Roll an extra die whenever you defend against an attack.

name: Lucky Coin
description: The faces change every time you flip it.
action: Once during your turn, you may use the Lucky Coin to reroll all blank dice on a trait roll that you just made. For each blank die on the reroll, take 1 Mental damage

name: Machete
description: Still razor sharp.
action: When you use the Machete to attack, add 1 to thte result of your roll.

name: Magic Camera
description: Click!
action: You may use your Sanity to make Knowledge rolls.

name: Map
description: Part of it keeps shifting. Somehow, different doors keep leading to the same place.
action: On your turn, you may bury the Map. If you do, place your explorer on any tile.

name: Mirror
description: The face in the mirror is calmer, and more knowing.
action: On your turn, you may bury the Mirror. If you do, heal your Knowledge and Sanity.

name: Mystical Stopwatch
description: When you start it, the hands go backwards.
action: On your turn, you may bury the Stopwatch. If you do, take another turn after this one. You may only use this ability after the haunt has started.

name: Necklace of Teeth
description: Most of them aren't even human.
action: At the end of your turn, you may gain 1 in a critical trait of your choice.

name: Rabbit's Foot
description: Lucky for some, but not for others. It certainly wasn't lucky for the rabbit.
action: Once during your turn, you may use the Rabbit's Foot to reroll one die that you just rolled.

name: Skeleton Key
description: Made with real bone.
action: You may move through walls. Whenever you do so, roll a die. If you roll a blank, bury the Skeleton Key. You may not use the Skeleton Key to discover new rooms.

name: Strange Amulet
description: Wearing it makes your thoughts feel remarkably clear.
action: Whenever you take Physical damage, gain 1 Sanity.

name: Strange Medicine
description: Side effects include jitters, nausea, and paranoia.
action: On your turn, you may bury the Strange Medicine. If you do, heal your Might and Speed.
